When I try to use Aircraft Autopilot's "Altitude Hold" function, my aircraft pitches up and down uncontrollably. This is a huge problem as I have FAR installed.

The reason I'm using it is for long-haul flights in RSS, including trans-atlantic and trans-pacific routes that take multiple hours, so it's easier to use an Autopilot system.

It isn't a problem with the design itself; The aircraft flew fine with it a couple days ago.

I use MechJeb For All.

 

The problem isn't vertical speed limit, either.

Any answers?
